skills.name: Install Nest CLI
skills.pattern:
npm install -g @nestjs/cli
nest new project-name

skills.name: Manual Install
skills.pattern: npm install @nestjs/core @nestjs/common @nestjs/platform-express reflect-metadata rxjs

skills.name: Module
Generate Module
skills.pattern:
nest generate module users
nest g mo users

skills.name: Controller
HTTP Decorators
skills.pattern: @Get(), @Post(), @Put(), @Patch(), @Delete(), @Options(), @Head(), @All()

skills.name: Request Data
skills.pattern: @Body() body, @Param('id') id, @Query('page') page, @Headers('authorization') auth, @Req() request, @Res() response

skills.name: Service
Dependency Injection
Custom Provider
Validation Pipe
Custom Pipe
Auth Guard
Use Guard
Interceptor
Exception Filter
Middleware
DTO
TypeORM
skills.pattern:
@Module({ imports: [TypeOrmModule.forRoot({ ... }), TypeOrmModule.forFeature([User])] })
@InjectRepository(User) private usersRepository: Repository<User>

skills.name: Prisma
GraphQL
skills.pattern: @Module({ imports: [GraphQLModule.forRoot<ApolloDriverConfig>({ driver: ApolloDriver, autoSchemaFile: true })] })

skills.name: WebSockets
Microservices
skills.pattern:
@MessagePattern('user_created')
handleUserCreated(data: CreateUserDto) { return this.usersService.create(data) }

skills.name: ConfigModule
skills.pattern:
@Module({ imports: [ConfigModule.forRoot()] })
// Usage: this.configService.get<string>('DATABASE_URL')

skills.name: Caching
Swagger
Testing
Task Scheduling
Queues
CLI Commands
skills.pattern:
nest g resource users --no-spec
// Creates: module, controller, service, dto, entity
